title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange in a report item, the color does not appear as expected.
EB: When setting the color or background color to orange in a report item, the color should be displayed correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a report item. 
2. Set the color or background color to orange. 
3. Verify that the color is not displayed correctly.
